channel.title: People Duping items through trade
channel.description:
Well, I don't have much time with school and homework and exams coming up, so I can't play a whole lot. So, someone on my source told me that people are duplicating.
You put 100 coins in trade.... And the other player puts nothing in. Then we both accept. On the second accept page, one person accepts. Then the other person accepts and as fast as he can, he clicks on decline then the other player got 100 coins and you still got 100 coins

item.title: People Duping items through trade
item.dc:creator: @runormal runormal
item.description:
@runormal wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:1, topic:263195”][quote author=runormal link=topic=347619.msg2676083#msg2676083 date=1235079676]
I dont know if this will work or not,

some one told me thsi while back

You can?

Step 1:
Open up Client.Java and search:

public void DeclineTrade() {

And you should see something like this:

public void DeclineTrade() { for (int i = 0; i < playerTItems.length; i++) { if (playerTItems[i] > 0) { fromTrade((playerTItems[i] - 1), i, playerTItemsN[i]); } } resetItems(3214); resetTrade(); }

So we need to disable it if they hit accept the trade

So we’ll do this:

public void DeclineTrade() { if (!hasAccepted) { for (int i = 0; i < playerTItems.length; i++) { if (playerTItems[i] > 0) { if (tradeStatus < 4) { fromTrade((playerTItems[i] - 1), i, playerTItemsN[i]); } } } } resetItems(3214); resetTrade(); }

Step 2: Ok, if you’re getting the cannot find the symbol error, then do this step. If you’re not, then ignore this step.

Declare this:

private boolean hasAccepted = false;

[/quote]

Put it in code tags for you. :P[/quote]

lol ok thanks ;D

Read full topic

item.title: People Duping items through trade

dasdad

2nd of all rep means nothing

I just had it saved in a text document so i didn’t bother making code tags

item.title: People Duping items through trade
item.dc:creator: @runormal runormal
item.description:
@runormal wrote:

I dont know if this will work or not,

some one told me thsi while back

You can?
[
Step 1:
Open up Client.Java and search:

Code: public void DeclineTrade() {

And you should see something like this:

Code:
public void DeclineTrade() {
for (int i = 0; i < playerTItems.length; i++) {
if (playerTItems[i] > 0) {
fromTrade((playerTItems[i] - 1), i, playerTItemsN[i]);
}
}
resetItems(3214);
resetTrade();
}

So we need to disable it if they hit accept the trade

So we’ll do this:

Code:
public void DeclineTrade() {
if (!hasAccepted) {
for (int i = 0; i < playerTItems.length; i++) {
if (playerTItems[i] > 0) {
if (tradeStatus < 4) {
fromTrade((playerTItems[i] - 1), i, playerTItemsN[i]);
}
}
}
}
resetItems(3214);
resetTrade();
}

Step 2: Ok, if you’re getting the cannot find the symbol error, then do this step. If you’re not, then ignore this step.

Declare this:

Code: private boolean hasAccepted = false;

Read full topic

You put 100 coins in trade.... And the other player puts nothing in. Then we both accept. On the second accept page, one person accepts. Then the other person accepts and as fast as he can, he clicks on decline then the other player got 100 coins and you still got 100 coins
